--D_CUSTOMERS_LOAD_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- 1. Rejestracja bronze_customers jako tymczasowy widok
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_customers
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/customers/'
);

-- 2. Rejestracja bronze_countries jako tymczasowy widok
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_countries
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/countries/'
);

-- 3. Przygotowanie danych – JOIN + wybór najnowszych po customer_id
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW new_bronze_d_customers AS
SELECT 
    c.customer_id,
    c.country_id,
    c.company_name,
    c.address,
    c.city,
    co.region_description,
    co.country,
    co.cluster,
    c.update_date as customer_update_date,
    co.update_date as country_update_date
FROM bronze_customers c
JOIN bronze_countries co
  ON c.country_id = co.country_id;

-- 4. Stworzenie tabeli docelowej jako Delta Lake (jeśli nie istnieje)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.d_customers
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
AS
SELECT * FROM new_bronze_d_customers
WHERE 1 = 0;

-- 5. Filtrowanie nowych lub zaktualizowanych rekordów
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_bronze_d_customers AS
SELECT * FROM new_bronze_d_customers n 
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM silver.d_customers s 
  WHERE s.customer_id = n.customer_id
    AND s.country_id = n.country_id
    AND s.customer_update_date = n.customer_update_date
    AND s.country_update_date = n.country_update_date
);

-- 6. MERGE (UPSERT)
MERGE INTO silver.d_customers AS target
USING filter_bronze_d_customers AS source
ON target.customer_id = source.customer_id

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    country_id = source.country_id,
    company_name = source.company_name,
    address = source.address,
    city = source.city,
    region_description = source.region_description,
    country = source.country,
    cluster = source.cluster,
    customer_update_date = source.customer_update_date,
    country_update_date = source.country_update_date

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    customer_id,
    country_id,
    company_name,
    address,
    city,
    region_description,
    country,
    cluster,
    customer_update_date,
    country_update_date
  )
  VALUES (
    source.customer_id,
    source.country_id,
    source.company_name,
    source.address,
    source.city,
    source.region_description,
    source.country,
    source.cluster,
    source.customer_update_date,
    source.country_update_date

--D_PRODUCTS_LOAD_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- ============================================
-- 1. Rejestracja danych z Bronze jako tymczasowy widok
-- ============================================

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_products
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/products'
);

-- ============================================
-- 2. Wybór najnowszych danych wg update_date
-- ============================================

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW new_d_products AS
SELECT 
    product_id,
    product_name,
    brand_name,
    sub_brand_name,
    category_name,
    update_date AS product_update_date
FROM bronze_products;

-- ============================================
-- 3. Stworzenie tabeli docelowej (Silver) jeśli nie istnieje
-- ============================================

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.d_products
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products'
AS
SELECT * FROM new_d_products
WHERE 1 = 0;

-- Filtrowanie nowych lub zaktualizowanych rekordów
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_d_products AS
SELECT * FROM new_d_products n 
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM silver.d_products s 
  WHERE s.product_id = n.product_id 
    AND s.product_update_date = n.product_update_date
);

-- ============================================
-- 4. MERGE INTO (UPSERT) danych do tabeli Silver
-- ============================================

MERGE INTO silver.d_products AS target
USING filter_d_products AS source
ON target.product_id = source.product_id

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    target.product_name = source.product_name,
    target.brand_name = source.brand_name,
    target.sub_brand_name = source.sub_brand_name,
    target.category_name = source.category_name,
    target.product_update_date = source.product_update_date

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id,
    product_name,
    brand_name,
    sub_brand_name,
    category_name,
    product_update_date
  )
  VALUES (
    source.product_id,
    source.product_name,
    source.brand_name,
    source.sub_brand_name,
    source.category_name,
    source.product_update_date);

--F_FORCAST_LOAD_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- ============================================
-- 1. Załaduj dane z warstwy Bronze jako tymczasowy widok
-- ============================================
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_forecast
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/forecast_details'
);

-- ============================================
-- 2. Agregacja najnowszych danych na poziomie miesiąca
-- ============================================
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW aggregated_forecast AS
SELECT 
    product_id,
    country_id,
    max(update_date) as forecast_update_date,
    TRUNC(forecast_date, "MM") AS forecast_date,
    TRUNC(forecast_snapshot, "MM") AS forecast_snapshot,
    
    SUM(quantity) AS quantity,
    SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity) AS whrs_sell_in_quantity,
    SUM(whrs_open_quantity) AS whrs_open_quantity,
    SUM(whrs_end_quantity) AS whrs_end_quantity,
    
    SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity) AS pos_sell_out_quantity,
    SUM(pos_open_quantity) AS pos_open_quantity,
    SUM(pos_end_quantity) AS pos_end_quantity,
    
    ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price), 2) AS amount,
    ROUND(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_sell_in_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(whrs_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_open_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(whrs_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_end_amount,
    
    ROUND(SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_sell_out_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_open_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_end_amount,
    
    ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
FROM  bronze_forecast
GROUP BY product_id, country_id, TRUNC(forecast_date, 'MM'), TRUNC(forecast_snapshot, 'MM');

-- ============================================
-- 3. Stwórz tabelę Silver, jeśli nie istnieje
-- ============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.f_forecast
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_forecast'
AS
SELECT * FROM aggregated_forecast
WHERE 1 = 0;


CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_aggregated_forecast AS
SELECT * from aggregated_forecast n 
where  NOT EXISTS (select product_id From silver.f_forecast s 
                    where s.product_id =n.product_id 
                      and s.country_id = n.country_id
                      and s.forecast_update_date = n.forecast_update_date
                      and s.forecast_date = n.forecast_date
                      and s.forecast_snapshot= n.forecast_snapshot);

-- ============================================
-- 4. Wykonaj MERGE INTO, aby zaktualizować lub dodać nowe dane
-- ============================================

MERGE INTO silver.f_forecast AS target
USING filter_aggregated_forecast AS source
ON target.product_id = source.product_id
   AND target.country_id = source.country_id
   AND target.forecast_date = source.forecast_date
   AND target.forecast_snapshot = source.forecast_snapshot

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    target.quantity = source.quantity,
    target.whrs_sell_in_quantity = source.whrs_sell_in_quantity,
    target.whrs_open_quantity = source.whrs_open_quantity,
    target.whrs_end_quantity = source.whrs_end_quantity,
    
    target.pos_sell_out_quantity = source.pos_sell_out_quantity,
    target.pos_open_quantity = source.pos_open_quantity,
    target.pos_end_quantity = source.pos_end_quantity,
    
    target.amount = source.amount,
    target.whrs_sell_in_amount = source.whrs_sell_in_amount,
    target.whrs_open_amount = source.whrs_open_amount,
    target.whrs_end_amount = source.whrs_end_amount,
    
    target.pos_sell_out_amount = source.pos_sell_out_amount,
    target.pos_open_amount = source.pos_open_amount,
    target.pos_end_amount = source.pos_end_amount,
    
    target.unit_price = source.unit_price,
    target.forecast_update_date = source.forecast_update_date

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id, country_id, forecast_date, forecast_snapshot,
    quantity, whrs_sell_in_quantity, whrs_open_quantity, whrs_end_quantity,
    pos_sell_out_quantity, pos_open_quantity, pos_end_quantity,
    amount, whrs_sell_in_amount, whrs_open_amount, whrs_end_amount,
    pos_sell_out_amount, pos_open_amount, pos_end_amount, unit_price,forecast_update_date
  )
  VALUES (
    source.product_id, source.country_id, source.forecast_date, source.forecast_snapshot,
    source.quantity, source.whrs_sell_in_quantity, source.whrs_open_quantity, source.whrs_end_quantity,
    source.pos_sell_out_quantity, source.pos_open_quantity, source.pos_end_quantity,
    source.amount, source.whrs_sell_in_amount, source.whrs_open_amount, source.whrs_end_amount,
    source.pos_sell_out_amount, source.pos_open_amount, source.pos_end_amount, source.unit_price,source.forecast_update_date
  );

%%pyspark
## 1. Załaduj dane z Bronze i Customers jako tymczasowe widoki
df_bronze = spark.read.option("header", "true").csv(
    "abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/MinIo_Pharmacies/*/*/*.csv"
)
df_bronze.createOrReplaceTempView("bronze_pos")

--F_POS_LOAD_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- ============================================
-- 1. Rejestracja danych z Bronze jako widok tymczasowy
-- ============================================
--CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_pos
--USING parquet
--OPTIONS (
--  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/MinIo_Pharmacies'
--);
-- ============================================
-- 2. Przygotowanie danych – najnowsze update + agregacja miesięczna
-- ============================================
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW aggregated_bronze_pos AS
SELECT 
    product_id,
    country_id,
    max(update_date) as pos_update_date,    
    TRUNC(transaction_date, "MM") AS transaction_date,
    SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity) AS pos_sell_out_quantity,
    SUM(pos_open_quantity) AS pos_open_quantity,
    SUM(pos_end_quantity) AS pos_end_quantity,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_sell_out_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_open_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_end_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
FROM  bronze_pos
GROUP BY product_id, country_id, TRUNC(transaction_date, "MM");


-- ============================================
-- 3. Stworzenie tabeli docelowej (Silver) jeśli nie istnieje
-- ============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.f_pos_data
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_pos_data'
AS
SELECT * FROM aggregated_bronze_pos
WHERE 1 = 0;


CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_aggregated_bronze_pos AS
SELECT * from aggregated_bronze_pos n 
where  NOT EXISTS (select product_id From silver.f_pos_data s 
                    where s.product_id =n.product_id 
                      and s.country_id = n.country_id
                      and s.pos_update_date = n.pos_update_date
                      and s.transaction_date = n.transaction_date);



-- ============================================
-- 4. MERGE INTO (UPSERT) danych do tabeli Delta
-- ============================================

MERGE INTO silver.f_pos_data AS target
USING filter_aggregated_bronze_pos AS source
ON target.product_id = source.product_id
   AND target.country_id = source.country_id
   AND target.transaction_date = source.transaction_date

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    target.pos_sell_out_quantity = source.pos_sell_out_quantity,
    target.pos_open_quantity = source.pos_open_quantity,
    target.pos_end_quantity = source.pos_end_quantity,
    target.pos_sell_out_amount = source.pos_sell_out_amount,
    target.pos_open_amount = source.pos_open_amount,
    target.pos_end_amount = source.pos_end_amount,
    target.unit_price = source.unit_price,
    target.pos_update_date = source.pos_update_date 

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id,
    country_id,
    transaction_date,
    pos_sell_out_quantity,
    pos_open_quantity,
    pos_end_quantity,
    pos_sell_out_amount,
    pos_open_amount,
    pos_end_amount,
    unit_price,
    pos_update_date 
  )
  VALUES (
    source.product_id,
    source.country_id,
    source.transaction_date,
    source.pos_sell_out_quantity,
    source.pos_open_quantity,
    source.pos_end_quantity,
    source.pos_sell_out_amount,
    source.pos_open_amount,
    source.pos_end_amount,
    source.unit_price,
    source.pos_update_date 
  );

--F_SALES_LOAD_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;
-- 1. Tymczasowe widoki na pliki z ADLS Gen2

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_orders
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/orders'
);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_order_details
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/order_details'
);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW d_customers
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.f_sales (
    country_id STRING,
    product_id STRING,
    shipped_date DATE,
    quantity DOUBLE,
    discount DOUBLE,
    amount DOUBLE,
    unit_price DOUBLE,
    order_details_update_date DATE,
    order_update_date DATE

)
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_sales/';

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW aggregated_bronze_orders AS
WITH orders_trunc AS (
    SELECT
        order_id,
        customer_id,
        TRUNC(order_date, 'MM') AS order_date,
        TRUNC(required_date, 'MM') AS required_date,
        TRUNC(shipped_date, 'MM') AS shipped_date,
        update_date AS order_update_date
    FROM bronze_orders
),
joined_orders AS (
    SELECT
        o.order_id,
        c.country_id,
        od.product_id,
        o.shipped_date,
        od.unit_price,
        od.quantity,
        od.discount,
        o.order_date,
        od.update_date AS order_details_update_date,
        o.order_update_date
    FROM orders_trunc o
    JOIN bronze_order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id
    JOIN d_customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
),
final_orders AS (
    SELECT
        country_id,
        product_id,
        shipped_date,
        MAX(order_details_update_date) AS order_details_update_date,
        MAX(order_update_date) AS order_update_date,
        SUM(quantity) AS quantity,
        SUM(discount) AS discount,
        ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price), 2) AS amount,
        ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
    FROM joined_orders
    GROUP BY country_id, product_id, shipped_date)
SELECT * FROM final_orders; 


CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_aggregated_bronze_orders AS
SELECT * from aggregated_bronze_orders  n 
where  NOT EXISTS (select product_id From silver.f_sales s 
                    where s.product_id =n.product_id 
                      and s.shipped_date = n.shipped_date
                      and s.order_details_update_date = n.order_details_update_date
                      and s.order_update_date = n.order_update_date);


-- 3. Przekształcenie i zapis danych do tabeli Silver z użyciem MERGE
MERGE INTO silver.f_sales AS target
USING filter_aggregated_bronze_orders AS source
ON target.country_id = source.country_id
   AND target.product_id = source.product_id
   AND target.shipped_date = source.shipped_date
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET
        quantity = source.quantity,
        discount = source.discount,
        amount = source.amount,
        unit_price = source.unit_price,
        order_details_update_date = source.order_details_update_date,
        order_update_date = source.order_update_date 
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        country_id, product_id, shipped_date,
        quantity, discount, amount, unit_price, order_details_update_date, order_update_date 
    )
    VALUES (
        source.country_id, source.product_id, source.shipped_date,
        source.quantity, source.discount, source.amount, source.unit_price,source.order_details_update_date,source.order_update_date 
    );

%%pyspark
## 1. Załaduj dane z Bronze i Customers jako tymczasowe widoki
df_bronze = spark.read.option("header", "true").csv(
    "abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/MinIo_Distributors/*/*/*.csv"
)
df_bronze.createOrReplaceTempView("bronze_inventory")

--F_WH_DATA_LOAD_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- 1. Załaduj dane z Bronze i Customers jako tymczasowe widoki
--CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_inventory
--USING parquet
--OPTIONS (
--  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/MinIo_Distributors/**'
--);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW silver_d_customers
USING delta
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
);

-- 2. Utwórz tabelę docelową Silver jako Delta (jeśli nie istnieje)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.f_wh_data (
  product_id STRING,
  country_id STRING,
  transaction_date DATE,
  whrs_sell_in_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_open_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_end_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_sell_in_amount DOUBLE,
  whrs_open_amount DOUBLE,
  whrs_end_amount DOUBLE,
  unit_price DOUBLE,
  whrs_update_date DATE
)
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_wh_data/';

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW aggregated_bronze_wh AS
    WITH join_wh AS (
        SELECT
            inv.*,
            c.country_id
        FROM bronze_inventory inv
        JOIN silver_d_customers c ON inv.customer_id = c.customer_id
    ),
    select_wh AS (
        SELECT
            product_id,
            country_id,
            update_date as whrs_update_date,
            TRUNC(transaction_date, 'MM') AS transaction_date,
            unit_price,
            whrs_sell_in_quantity,
            whrs_open_quantity,
            whrs_end_quantity
        FROM join_wh
    ),
    aggregated AS (
        SELECT
            product_id,
            country_id,
            transaction_date,
            max(whrs_update_date) as  whrs_update_date,
            SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity) AS whrs_sell_in_quantity,
            SUM(whrs_open_quantity) AS whrs_open_quantity,
            SUM(whrs_end_quantity) AS whrs_end_quantity,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_sell_in_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_open_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_end_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
        FROM select_wh
        GROUP BY product_id, country_id, transaction_date
    )
 SELECT * FROM aggregated;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_aggregated_bronze_wh AS
SELECT * from aggregated_bronze_wh  n 
where  NOT EXISTS (select product_id From silver.f_wh_data s 
                    where s.product_id =n.product_id 
                      and s.country_id = n.country_id
                      and s.transaction_date = n.transaction_date
                      and s.whrs_update_date = n.whrs_update_date);


-- 3. MERGE danych do tabeli Silver z agregacją i filtrowaniem
MERGE INTO silver.f_wh_data AS target
USING filter_aggregated_bronze_wh AS source
ON target.product_id = source.product_id
   AND target.country_id = source.country_id
   AND target.transaction_date = source.transaction_date
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    whrs_sell_in_quantity = source.whrs_sell_in_quantity,
    whrs_open_quantity = source.whrs_open_quantity,
    whrs_end_quantity = source.whrs_end_quantity,
    whrs_sell_in_amount = source.whrs_sell_in_amount,
    whrs_open_amount = source.whrs_open_amount,
    whrs_end_amount = source.whrs_end_amount,
    unit_price = source.unit_price,
    whrs_update_date = source.whrs_update_date
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id, country_id, transaction_date,
    whrs_sell_in_quantity, whrs_open_quantity, whrs_end_quantity,
    whrs_sell_in_amount, whrs_open_amount, whrs_end_amount,
    unit_price, whrs_update_date
  )
  VALUES (
    source.product_id, source.country_id, source.transaction_date,
    source.whrs_sell_in_quantity, source.whrs_open_quantity, source.whrs_end_quantity,
    source.whrs_sell_in_amount, source.whrs_open_amount, source.whrs_end_amount,
    source.unit_price,source.whrs_update_date
  );

-- D_DIM_SQL
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS gold;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW silver_d_products AS
SELECT * FROM delta.`abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products`;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW silver_d_regions AS
SELECT * FROM delta.`abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers`;

-- Tworzenie tabel w warstwie Gold

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gold.d_products
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products'
AS
SELECT product_id AS IdProduct,
       product_name AS Name,
       brand_name AS Brand,
       sub_brand_name AS SubBrand,
       category_name AS Category 
 FROM silver_d_products
WHERE 1 = 0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gold.d_regions
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
AS
SELECT country_id AS IDCountry,
       cluster AS Claster,
       region_description AS Region,
       country AS Country
FROM silver_d_regions
WHERE 1 = 0;

-- Zmiana nazw kolumn w tabeli d_products i zapis do warstwy Gold
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_products

SELECT 
    product_id AS IdProduct,
    product_name AS Name,
    brand_name AS Brand,
    sub_brand_name AS SubBrand,
    category_name AS Category
FROM silver_d_products;

-- Usuwanie duplikatów w tabeli d_regions i zapis do nowej tabeli Gold
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_regions
SELECT DISTINCT 
    country_id AS IDCountry,
    cluster AS Claster,
    region_description AS Region,
    country AS Country
FROM silver_d_regions;

%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, max, coalesce, trunc, lit, add_months
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.functions import to_date

# Tworzenie sesji Spark
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("Load Planning Book").getOrCreate()

# Parametry dla warstwy Silver (ADLS Gen2)
bucket_name = "abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/"
bucket_name_gold = "abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/"

# Ścieżki do plików Parquet w ADLS Gen2
f_sales_path = f"{bucket_name}/f_sales"
f_forecast_path = f"{bucket_name}/f_forecast"
f_pos_data_path = f"{bucket_name}/f_pos_data"
f_wh_data_path = f"{bucket_name}/f_wh_data"

# Ścieżka do warstwy Gold (f_planning_book)
f_sales_path_gold = f"{bucket_name_gold}/f_planning_book"

# Załaduj dane z ADLS (tabele f_sales, f_forecast, f_pos_data, f_wh_data)
f_sales = spark.read.parquet(f_sales_path)
f_forecast = spark.read.parquet(f_forecast_path)
f_pos_data = spark.read.parquet(f_pos_data_path)
f_wh_data = spark.read.parquet(f_wh_data_path)



# Pobranie maksymalnej wartości forecast_snapshot z f_forecast
current_month_snapshot = f_forecast.agg(F.max("forecast_snapshot")).collect()[0][0]
current_month_snapshot = to_date(lit(current_month_snapshot), "yyyy-MM-dd")
last_month_snapshot = F.add_months(F.lit(current_month_snapshot), -1)

f_forecast_filtered = f_forecast.filter(F.col("forecast_snapshot").isin(current_month_snapshot, last_month_snapshot))

# Filtrowanie dla obecnego i poprzedniego miesiąca
f_forecast_current = f_forecast_filtered.filter((F.col("forecast_date") >= current_month_snapshot) &(F.col("forecast_snapshot") == current_month_snapshot))
f_forecast_last = f_forecast_filtered.filter((F.col("forecast_date") >= last_month_snapshot) &  (F.col("forecast_snapshot") == last_month_snapshot))

# Filtrowanie f_sales

f_sales_current = f_sales.filter(F.col("shipped_date") < current_month_snapshot)
f_sales_last = f_sales.filter(F.col("shipped_date") < last_month_snapshot)

f_pos_data_current = f_pos_data.filter(F.col("transaction_date") < current_month_snapshot)
f_pos_data_last = f_pos_data.filter(F.col("transaction_date") < last_month_snapshot)

f_wh_data_current = f_wh_data.filter(F.col("transaction_date") < current_month_snapshot)
f_wh_data_last = f_wh_data.filter(F.col("transaction_date") < last_month_snapshot)


# Ujednolicona lista kolumn
common_columns = [
    "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
    "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
    "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
    "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
    "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
    "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
    "discount"
]

# Normalizacja f_forecast (zachowuje oryginalny forecast_snapshot)
f_forecast_current_norm = f_forecast_current \
    .withColumnRenamed("forecast_date", "financial_date") \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
        "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
        "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
        "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
        "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
        "0.0 as discount"  # Jeżeli discount jest typu double
    )

f_forecast_last_norm = f_forecast_last \
    .withColumnRenamed("forecast_date", "financial_date") \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
        "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
        "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
        "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
        "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
        "0.0 as discount"  # Jeżeli discount jest typu double
    )



# Normalizacja f_sales
f_sales_current_norm = f_sales_current \
    .withColumnRenamed("shipped_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot",  current_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_quantity", "0 as whrs_open_quantity", "0 as whrs_end_quantity",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_amount", "0 as whrs_open_amount", "0 as whrs_end_amount",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_quantity", "0 as pos_open_quantity", "0 as pos_end_quantity",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_amount", "0 as pos_open_amount", "0 as pos_end_amount",
        "discount"
    )

f_sales_last_norm = f_sales_last \
    .withColumnRenamed("shipped_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot", last_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_quantity", "0 as whrs_open_quantity", "0 as whrs_end_quantity",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_amount", "0 as whrs_open_amount", "0 as whrs_end_amount",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_quantity", "0 as pos_open_quantity", "0 as pos_end_quantity",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_amount", "0 as pos_open_amount", "0 as pos_end_amount",
        "discount"
    )

# Normalizacja f_pos_data_path
f_pos_data_current_norm = f_pos_data_current \
    .withColumnRenamed("transaction_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot", current_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "0 as quantity", "0 as amount", "unit_price",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_quantity", "0 as whrs_open_quantity", "0 as whrs_end_quantity",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_amount", "0 as whrs_open_amount", "0 as whrs_end_amount",
        "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
        "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
        "0 as discount"
    )

f_pos_data_last_norm = f_pos_data_last \
    .withColumnRenamed("transaction_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot", last_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "0 as quantity", "0 as amount", "unit_price",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_quantity", "0 as whrs_open_quantity", "0 as whrs_end_quantity",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_amount", "0 as whrs_open_amount", "0 as whrs_end_amount",
        "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
        "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
        "0 as discount"
    )

# Normalizacja f_wh_data_path
f_wh_data_current_norm = f_wh_data_current \
    .withColumnRenamed("transaction_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot",  current_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "0 as quantity", "0 as amount", "unit_price",
        "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
        "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_quantity", "0 as pos_open_quantity", "0 as pos_end_quantity",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_amount", "0 as pos_open_amount", "0 as pos_end_amount",
        "0 as discount"
    )

f_wh_data_last_norm = f_wh_data_last \
    .withColumnRenamed("transaction_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot", last_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "0 as quantity", "0 as amount", "unit_price",
        "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
        "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_quantity", "0 as pos_open_quantity", "0 as pos_end_quantity",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_amount", "0 as pos_open_amount", "0 as pos_end_amount",
        "0 as discount"
    )


# UNION wszystkich DataFrame'ów

f_forecast_current_norm
f_forecast_last_norm
f_sales_current_norm 
f_sales_last_norm
f_pos_data_current_norm
f_pos_data_last_norm
f_wh_data_current_norm
f_wh_data_last_norm

final_df = f_forecast_current_norm.unionByName(f_forecast_last_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_sales_current_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_sales_last_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_pos_data_current_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_pos_data_last_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_wh_data_current_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_wh_data_last_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) 


bucket_name_gold = "gold"

# Load Data
f_sales_path = f"s3a://{bucket_name}/f_planning_book"

aggregated_df = final_df.groupBy(
    "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot"
).agg(
    # Suma dla kolumn liczbowych
    F.sum("quantity").alias("quantity"),
    F.sum("amount").alias("amount"),
    F.avg("unit_price").alias("unit_price"),
    
    # Suma dla innych kolumn
    F.sum("whrs_sell_in_quantity").alias("whrs_sell_in_quantity"),
    F.sum("whrs_open_quantity").alias("whrs_open_quantity"),
    F.sum("whrs_end_quantity").alias("whrs_end_quantity"),
    F.sum("whrs_sell_in_amount").alias("whrs_sell_in_amount"),
    F.sum("whrs_open_amount").alias("whrs_open_amount"),
    F.sum("whrs_end_amount").alias("whrs_end_amount"),
    
    F.sum("pos_sell_out_quantity").alias("pos_sell_out_quantity"),
    F.sum("pos_open_quantity").alias("pos_open_quantity"),
    F.sum("pos_end_quantity").alias("pos_end_quantity"),
    F.sum("pos_sell_out_amount").alias("pos_sell_out_amount"),
    F.sum("pos_open_amount").alias("pos_open_amount"),
    F.sum("pos_end_amount").alias("pos_end_amount"),
    
    # Agregacja dla discount (średnia)
    F.sum("discount").alias("discount")
)


aggregated_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(f_sales_path_gold)





import pandas as pd

# Załaduj dane
df_pandas = aggregated_df.toPandas()

df_pandas = df_pandas.drop(columns=['discount', 'unit_price'])

# Unpivotowanie (melt)
df_melted = df_pandas.melt(
   id_vars=['product_id', 'country_id', 'financial_date', 'forecast_snapshot'],
    var_name="original_column",
    value_name="value"
)


# Tworzenie nowej kolumny 'measure' na podstawie obecności 'quantity' lub 'amount' w nazwie kolumny
df_melted["Measure"] = df_melted["original_column"].apply(lambda x: "EA" if "quantity" in x.lower() else "GTS" if "amount" in x.lower() else "unknown")

# Mapowanie nazw kolumn na nowe formaty
measure_mapping = {
    'quantity': 'Ex-Factory',
    'amount': 'Ex-Factory',
    'whrs_sell_in_quantity': 'Sales to pharmacies',
    'whrs_open_quantity': 'Open Stock',
    'whrs_end_quantity': 'Close Stock',
    'whrs_sell_in_amount': 'Sales to pharmacies',
    'whrs_open_amount': 'Open Stock',
    'whrs_end_amount': 'Close Stock',
    'pos_sell_out_quantity': 'Sales to pharmacies',
    'pos_open_quantity': 'Open Stock Pharmacies',
    'pos_end_quantity': 'Close Stock Pharmacies',
    'pos_sell_out_amount': 'Sales to pharmacies',
    'pos_open_amount': 'Open Stock Pharmacies',
    'pos_end_amount': 'Close Stock Pharmacies'
}

# Zastosowanie mapowania
df_melted["original_column"] = df_melted["original_column"].replace(measure_mapping)

# Usuwamy wiersze z brakującymi wartościami
df_melted = df_melted.dropna(subset=["original_column", "value"])

# Pivotowanie danych
df_pivoted = df_melted.pivot_table(
    index=['product_id', 'country_id', 'financial_date', 'forecast_snapshot', 'Measure'],  
    columns='original_column',
    values='value',
    aggfunc='first'  # lub 'sum', jeśli chcesz sumować wartości
).reset_index()

# Usunięcie nazwy kolumny po pivotowaniu
df_pivoted.columns.name = None


# Znalezienie maksymalnej daty
max_forecast_snapshot = df_pivoted["forecast_snapshot"].max()

# Dodanie kolumny status
df_pivoted["Version"] =  df_pivoted["forecast_snapshot"].apply(lambda x: "Current" if x == max_forecast_snapshot  else "Last")

bucket_name_gold = "abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_planning_book_unpivot"

# Ścieżka do warstwy Gold (f_planning_book)
f_sales_path_gold = f"{bucket_name_gold}/f_planning_book_unpivot"

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(df_pivoted)

df_spark=df_spark.withColumnRenamed('product_id', 'IdProduct').withColumnRenamed('country_id', 'IDCountry').withColumnRenamed('financial_date', 'Date').withColumnRenamed('Close Stock', 'Close_Stock').withColumnRenamed('Ex-Factory', 'Ex_Factory').withColumnRenamed('Open Stock', 'Open_Stock').withColumnRenamed('Open Stock Pharmacies', 'Open_Stock_Pharmacies').withColumnRenamed('Sales to pharmacies', 'Sales_to_pharmacies').withColumnRenamed('Close Stock Pharmacies', 'Close_Stock_Pharmacies')


df_spark.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_planning_book_unpivot")
